mapper.select: SELECT A.*, C.* FROM ACCOUNT A, CRITIC C WHERE A.NO = C.NO

SELECT A.NO, A.NAME, C.COMPANY, C.CAREER, M.MV_NO, R.RV_NICK, R.RV_TITLE, R.RV_CONTENT, R.RV_DATE FROM ACCOUNT A, CRITIC C, REVIEW R, MOVIE M WHERE A.NO = C.NO AND C.NO = R.NO AND R.MV_NO = M.MV_NO AND A.NO = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM ACCOUNT A, CRITIC C, REVIEW R WHERE A.NO = C.NO AND C.NO = R.NO AND A.NO = #{no}
SELECT A.NAME FROM CRITIC C, ACCOUNT A WHERE A.No = C.NO AND C.NO = #{no}
SELECT A.*, C.* FROM ACCOUNT A, CRITICAPPLY C WHERE A.NO = C.NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRITICAPPLY (NO, COMPANY, CAREER, FILENAME) VALUES (#{no}, #{company}, #{career}, #{filename})
INSERT INTO CRITIC SELECT * FROM CRITICAPPLY WHERE NO = #{no}
